message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. It's a good deal for both of us!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think we can find something more equitable. How about a 70/30 split in my favor?  It's a good starting point for negotiation.
Okay, let's try a 60/40 split in my favor. This is the last offer I'll make with this much for you. I'm getting impatient.
I understand your impatience, Alice, but rushing into a deal won't benefit either of us. Let's meet in the middle - 65/35. It's a fair split considering the time constraint and the decreasing value.
